title: RCF 04 - Organization Funding
body:
Summary:
This proposal aims to determine the organization that will receive this month’s grant from the RCF. The top vote recipient will receive $3,858.91 that has previously been deposited into the fund. No additional donations will be made at this time. This gift will deplete the fund.

Background:
The Rari Capital Foundation contains funds that we can send to US based 501(c)(3) organizations. We have $3,858.91 remaining in the Rari Capital Foundation from our donation in November 2020, as of October 1st 2021. 
You can learn more about Endaoment’s Community Funds here: Endaoment Documentation.

Abstract:
This proposal aims to determine which organization will receive funding from the RCF this month. Organizations were added to the list below by Rari core contributors.
To nominate other organizations, comment with the Endaoment link for an organization and a short blurb about why the RCF should support them. Organizations with at least 3 upvotes will be included in the final Snapshot vote ranked by upvotes, with no more than 10 organizations total.

Motivation:
To determine where to send funds that have already been donated to the Rari Capital Foundation which is held at Endaoment.

CC DECIDE: Environmental Defense Fund
CC DECIDE: She256
CC DECIDE: Black and Pink Inc
CC DECIDE: Lavender Rights Project
CC DECIDE: National Network of Abortion Funds
CC DECIDE: Institute for Non Profit News
CC DECIDE: Cancer Research Institute, Inc.
CC DECIDE: 18 Reasons
author: 0x9D5025B327E6B863E5050141C987d988c07fd8B2
